Snapdeal is India's leading pure-play value Ecommerce platform. Founded in 2010 by Kunal Bahl and Rohit Bansal
column2: Snapdeal is one of the top four online lifestyle shopping destinations of India.

column1: Snapdeal brings together a wide assortment of good quality and value- priced merchandise on its platform. Snapdeal's vision is to enable the shoppers of Bharat to experience the joy of living their aspirations through reliable
column3: multilingual interface and cutting edge technology
column4: Snapdeal has simplified the shopping experience for its value-conscious buyers by showcasing the most relevant products- products that are a good functional fit with their needs and of a quality that lasts- thereby delivering  true value to its customers. With its commitment to high service standards
column5: Snapdeal suppliers operate under a well structured ecosystem that enables them to offer great quality products at affordable prices.

column3: price-conscious buyers coming from the non-metros
column4: Snapdeal’s logistics networks powered by third party logistics cover more than 96% of India’s pin codes enabling order deliveries to more than 2500 towns and cities and expanding.

column2: Snapdeal's mission is to become India’s value lifestyle omni-channel leader. We are excited about continuing to build a complete ecosystem around value commerce
column3: where we can serve Bharat consumers wherever they are on their offline to online shopping journey.

column1: Snapdeal is part of the AceVector Group and one of India’s best-known e-commerce companies with an exclusive focus on the value segment.
